rewoo_description.content: ReWOO (Reasoning without Observation) system for recommendation tasks. Uses Planning, Working, and Solving phases to decompose complex recommendation problems.

rewoo_system_intro.content: You are managing a ReWOO (Reasoning without Observation) system for recommendation tasks. The system operates in three phases: Planning (decompose task), Working (execute sub-tasks), and Solving (synthesize results).

phase_transitions.content:
Phase 1: Planning - Create execution plan
Phase 2: Working - Execute each plan step
Phase 3: Solving - Generate final recommendation
